title: All things Identity, in the cloud
subtitle: GATACA Cloud is a marketplace of SSI-based applications in SaaS version. Accessible for buisinesses of all sizes.
description: GATACA Cloud will serve as a single entry point for clients to contract and manage applications in the cloud. Our EBSI-compliant, sector-focused applications will enable companies to execute faster pilots and integrations of SSI.

bullets.title: ACCESSIBLE
bullets.description: If on-premise is not your thing, we've got you covered.

bullets.title: FLEXIBLE
bullets.description: Choose the applications you wish to contract, forget the rest.

bullets.title: SECURE
bullets.description: Our privacy-preserving & government grade secure features still apply.

bullets.title: EFFICIENT
bullets.description: Enjoy a seamless contract, integration, and execution of services.

ctaSection.title: Curious to see it in action?
ctaSection.description: Check out the GATACA Cloud sandbox
